info.description: Provides data upon sport events, markets for market maker
info.title: External Market Maker API

post.description: Please access to our website, in Settings/Token to get/create a list of tokens to login with this endpoint
Please use this endpoint to refresh your "access_token" after login, access_token will expire after 10 minutes and can be refresh using "refresh_token" given by /auth/login endpoint

Provide a list of valid odds

parameters.description: Player ID will be unique in tournament, use this param to get player by tournament ID
parameters.name: tournament_id

get.description:
get the list of all available sport events
#### The list of tournaments

| Tournament ID   | Name                  |
|----------       |-------------          |
| 109             | MLB                   |
| 2541            | KBO League            |
| 1036            | Professional Baseball |
| 233             | NFL Preseason         |
| 31              | NFL                   |
| 234             | NHL                   |
| 132             | NBA                   |

parameters.description: set it true if want to return tournaments that have active sport_events
parameters.name: has_active_events

404.description: Your requested data is not found

post.description:
### Place a wager
`wager_strategy` with value `fillOrKill` that will be auto-canceled if no match is made in 2 seconds
For normal wagers, just remove the `wager_strategy` field

get.description: Get connection config for websocket client

id.description: ID should be ref_id in database

origin_market_line.description:
OriginMarketLine for determine the home outcome line (always return the line of HOME competitor)
This would enable MM to start pricing spreads faster
ticket for this: https://betprophet.atlassian.net/browse/PAR-534

balance.description:
for now, only return `total_balance` for MM
the field name will be kept as `balance` for backward compatible

message.description:
| Error Code                         | Error Message                                                                         | HTTP Status Code | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
		   				| ---------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
		   				| invalid_request                    | Invalid request                                                                       | 400              | Invalid request: invalid body or param or header provided in general. When can’t find detail error                                                                                                                      |
		   				| invalid_param                      | Invalid param: <param_name>                                                           | 400              | Invalid parameter with given name                                                                                                                                                                                       |
		   				| unauthorized                       | Unauthorized                                                                          | 401              | Invalid authorization token                                                                                                                                                                                             |
		   				| data_not_found                     | Data not found                                                                        | 404              | Requested data does not exists or not found                                                                                                                                                                             |
		   				| data_not_found                     | Not found: <entity_name>                                                              | 404              | Requested data does not exists or not found (point out detail which entity not found)                                                                                                                                   |
		   				| internal_error                     | Internal server error                                                                 | 500              | Internal server error                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
		   				| keypair_num_exceed                 | Cannot create new key pair, only 20 key pair can be created                           | 403              | Number of existed key pairs has reached the maximum number of 20 key pairs                                                                                                                                              |
		   				| session_num_exceed                 | Cannot authorize new session, only 20 sessions can exist simultaneously               | 403              | Number of authorized sessions has reached the maximum number of 20 sessions                                                                                                                                             |
		   				| rate_limit_reached                 | Rate limit reached, can only send up to 50 requests per seconds                       | 429              | Rate limit reached                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
		   				| insufficient_amount                | You don’t have sufficient amount to proceed the operation                             | 403              | This is an example error code for any given operation                                                                                                                                                                   |
		   				| invalid_line_id                    | Invalid line id                                                                       | 400              | Invalid line id                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
		   				| invalid_stake                      | Invalid stake                                                                         | 400              | Invalid stake                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
		   				| invalid_external_id                | Invalid external id                                                                   | 400              | Invalid external id                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
		   				| wager_limit_exceeded               | Wager limit exceeded                                                                  | 400              | The error is raised when total wager or bet exceeds the allowed limit, currently the maximum batch is 20.                                                                                                               |
		   				| invalid_wager_id                   | Invalid wager id                                                                      | 400              | Invalid wager id                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
		   				| invalid_cursor                     | Invalid cursor                                                                        | 400              | Invalid cursor param                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
		   				| invalid_from                       | Invalid param from                                                                    | 400              | Invalid param from                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
		   				| invalid_to                         | Invalid param to                                                                      | 400              | Invalid param to                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
		   				| invalid_updated_at_from            | Invalid param updated_at_from                                                         | 400              | Invalid param updated_at_from                                                                                                                                                                                           |
		   				| invalid_updated_at_to              | Invalid param updated_at_to                                                           | 400              | Invalid param updated_at_to                                                                                                                                                                                             |
		   				| invalid_competitor_id              | Invalid competitor id                                                                 | 400              | Invalid competitor id, when                                                                                                                                                                                             |
		   				| sport_event_not_found              | Sport event not found                                                                 | 404              | Sport event not found                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
		   				| market_invalid_event               | Invalid event_id                                                                      | 400              | This error is used when attempting to create or access a market with an invalid event ID. The condition EventID <= 0 or r.EventID > 2147483647 checks if the provided event ID is equal to 0 or falls outside the valid |
		   				| market_event_limit_exceeded        | Event limit exceeded                                                                  | 400              | This error is raised when the number of event_ids in a market query exceeds the allowed limit, currently (0, 50]                                                                                                        |
		   				| opened_retry                       | We are processing other request. Please wait and retry later                          | 500              | Newly opened wager is in its first matching queue, please retry after 300ms.                                                                                                                                            |
		   				| unknown_error                      | Unknown error                                                                         | 500              | Unknown error                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
		   				| err_ref_id_invalid                 | reference id invalid                                                                  | 404              | Reference id invalid, currently 0                                                                                                                                                                                       |
		   				| event_not_available                | event is not available for betting                                                    | 400              | Event is not available for betting                                                                                                                                                                                      |
		   				| sport_event_competitor_blacklisted | can not place bet with given competitors                                              | 400              | The event competitor in blacklisted                                                                                                                                                                                     |
		   				| sport_event_is_not_booked          | sport event is not booked                                                             | 400              | sport event is not booked                                                                                                                                                                                               |
		   				| wager_ref_id_existed               | wager ref id is already existing                                                      | 400              | Wager ref id is already existing                                                                                                                                                                                        |
		   				| wager_already_matched              | failed to cancel wager. wager is already matched                                      | 400              | Wager is already matched                                                                                                                                                                                                |
		   				| wager_not_belongs_to_user          | this wager does not belong to user                                                    | 500              | Wager not belong to the user (who 's calling)                                                                                                                                                                           |
		   				| wager_already_cancelled            | failed to cancel wager. wager is already cancelled                                    | 400              | Wager is already cancelled                                                                                                                                                                                              |
		   				| wager_is_invalid                   | The wager you attempting to cancel is invalid                                         | 400              | Wager’ status is invalid                                                                                                                                                                                                |
		   				| wager_invalid_odds                 | invalid odds (consider extract keyword and return like partner error, for consistent) | 400              | invalid odds, when odds <= 1.0                                                                                                                                                                                          |
		   				| wager_not_matching_external_id     | external id must matches with existing wager                                          | 400              | External id must matches with existing wager                                                                                                                                                                            |
		   				| wager_opened_retry                 | Newly opened wager is in its first matching queue, please retry after 300ms.          | 425              | Failed to lock wager when cancel wager.                                                                                                                                                                                 |
		   				| wager_is_placing                   | cannot cancel a placing wager, please try again later                                 | 409              | Cannot cancel a placing wager                                                                                                                                                                                           |
		   				| wager_stake_exceeds_max            | your wager stake exceeds the maximum allowed                                          | 400              | your wager stake exceeds the maximum allowed, currently 100000000                                                                                                                                                       |
		   				| wager_external_id_existed          | given user id already has wager with the same external id                             | 400              | given user id already has wager with the same external id                                                                                                                                                               |
		   				| wager_balance_check_timeout        | wallet check balance request timeout                                                  | 500              | Time out when check wager balance                                                                                                                                                                                       |
		   				| wager_unable_place                 | we cannot place your bet                                                              | 500              | Unhadled error in wager.                                                                                                                                                                                                |
		   				| wager_unable_cancel                | failed to cancel wager                                                                | 500              | For unhanled wager                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
		   				| invalid_market_id                  | Invalid market id                                                                     | 400              | Invalid market id, when even id equal to zero                                                                                                                                                                           |
		   		  	| invalid_event_id                   | Invalid event id                                                                      | 400              | Invalid event id, when even id equal to zero                                                                                                                                                                            |
		   		  	| supplemental_market_pre_match_only | supplemental market just ready for pre-match sport event                              | 400              | When market line' type is sup_moneyline, the sport event’ status must not equal to not_started                                                                                                                          |
		   		  	| market_line_invalid                | market line id is invalid                                                             | 400              | when can’t found market by line id in database                                                                                                                                                                          |
		   		  	| wallet_not_found                   | Wallet not found                                                                      | 404              | Wallet not found                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
		   		  	| no_cancellable_wagers              | Failed to cancel wagers. No available wagers to be cancelled                          | 404              | No cancellable wagers                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
		   		  	| wager_invalid_profit               | update odds or stake then try again                                                   | 400              | The profit calculated from odds and stake less than 1 cent                                                                                                                                                              |
		   		  	| reporting_not_available            | reporting service not available                                                       | 503              | Reporting DB in maintenance mode                                                                                                                                                                                        |
		   		  	| from_date_greater_than_to_date     | from date must be lower than to date                                                  | 400              | Param from must be lower than param to                                                                                                                                                                                  |
		   		  	| invalid_from_to_range              | 'from' can't be more than 7 days from 'to'                                            | 400              | Param from can't be more than 7 days from param to                                                                                                                                                                      |
		   		  	| invalid_updated_at_range           | updated_at_from can't be more than 2 days from updated_at_to                          | 400              | Param updated_at_from can't be more than 2 days from param updated_at_to                                                                                                                                                |
					| missing_date_range           | missing date range param                          | 400              | Missing date range param                                                                                                                                                |
					| too_many_delayed_requests           |The request cannot be delayed at the moment                         | 429              | Request rate limit for delayed processing has been reached                                                                                                                                                |
					| err_wager_placement_disabled           | wager placement is currently disabled                         | 403              | The system under maintenance mode so not allow place wager                                                                                                                                                |

external_id.description: max length is 100, only contain A-z, 0-9, _, -

Token.description: Please use "access_token" from the response of /auth/login endpoint, and add "Bearer" with space as prefix. For example: /auth/login response: {"access_token": "ACCESS_TOKEN"}, then please use "Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN"
Token.name: Authorization
